epoch().details: Value is dereferenced from proxy storage and world

getAmountIn(uint256).details: Returns valid output only for integer workersToBuy value

returns._0: Amount of prosperity needed for workersToBuy

init(address).details: Called by factory contract which creates current instance

swapProsperityForExactWorkers(uint256,ui.details: Even though function is opened, it can be executed only by ISettlement because only ISettlement can have prosperity

params.maxProsperityToSell: Maximum amount of prosperity to be taken for exact amount of workers

returns._0: Amount of workers bought by prosperity

world().details: Value is dereferenced from proxy storage

currentZone.details: Immutable, initialized on the zone creation

lastPurchaseTime.details: Updated every time when #swapProsperityForExactWorkers is called

startingPrice.details: Updated every time when #swapProsperityForExactWorkers is called

currentZone().notice: Zone to which this pool belongs

getAmountIn(uint256).notice: Calculates input of prosperity based on output whole amount of workers

lastPurchaseTime().notice: Time at which last purchase is performed
